title: Remove endorsement eager-loading from health query
description:
Edit `src/backend/app/graphql/queries/health.py` to remove:
1. Import of `Endorsement` model
2. The `selectinload(User.endorsements_received)` chain from the query options
3. The `endorsements=user.endorsements_received` parameter when constructing `UserType` in the loop
Ensure the health query still works and returns users correctly.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `Endorsement` import in health.py
- No `selectinload(User.endorsements_received)` in query options
- No `endorsements` parameter passed to UserType constructor
- Health query executes successfully
- Query returns valid user data
